[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-22 09:10:00
Category I trauma activation for 38-year-old male, MVC at highway speed.
BP 90/60, HR 120, RR 24, GCS 14.
Alert and oriented x3. Mechanism of injury: unrestrained driver, high-speed MVC.
Anticipated operative intervention likely given abdominal distension.
No prior outside laboratory results available.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-01-22 09:15:00
Labs drawn per trauma protocol: CBC, BMP, type and screen, coagulation panel.
Lactic acid 3.2. Hemoglobin 10.1.

[LAB] 2026-01-22 09:30:00
CBC: WBC 14.2, Hgb 10.1, Hct 30.2, Plt 198.
